Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Harrison/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Harrison/Kolmar.

#7 Harrison Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, 5th Ave, and resume normal route.

#7 Harrison Westbound  buses will operate via Congress, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at 16th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are rrtd in both directions via 16th, Hamlin, Ogden, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 16th, due to police activity near 16th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 16th, Hamlin, Ogden, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 16th, due to police activity near 16th/Kedzie.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Morse/Greenview
ShortDescription: Eastbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Ashland, Lunt and resume normal route, due to police activity near Morse/Greenview.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Ashland, Lunt and resume normal route, due to police activity near Morse/Greenview.
